channel.title: Need serious help
channel.description:
Alright, well the problem is; when I log into the server I automatically log out like instantly and it continues to log me out, the server is online and on port 43594 on which I have port forwarded. The error message I get is: Error:" T2 - 126,126,126 - 12,0,0 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,10,76,-59," That's from the Moparscape client. This is what the server command says. [Riotday] Connected - Game saved for player Riotday - [Riotday] Disconnected . I'm not sure of this problem and you're help would greatly be appreciated. I'm also using a 317 source, I've actually tried all types of sources. Nothing seems to work, so please help me.. I'm using windows 7 aswell..
Thanks, Riot

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Riotday Riotday
item.description:
@Riotday wrote:

Alrighty man, I’ll give it a try and hope it works if so you’re the greatest, any other ideas from others would be greatly
appreciated aswell

Edit: The Java Jdk 20 didn’t help, if anyone would like to teamview me or better help you can add me on msn at lostuponfatality@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Slightly Offtopic; Can I Just Say, Some People I’ve Seen HAve Experienced some sort of problem with the latest java’s try sticking with java jdk1.6.0_20 and jre6, http://uppit.com/38se0mqnvzra/jdk20.rar, thats a jdk1.6.0_20, Pop That Into Your © drive, Program Files, Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @Riotday Riotday
item.description:
@Riotday wrote:

It can’t be Java, I have the new versions of everything, my classpaths perfectly set. It even creates an account in the character files, even my friends log out instantly… even I do, on 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 I’ve even tried to the server ip and the no-ip. nothing works, I’m port forwarded and everything…

Read full topic

if it still crashes…maybe its your java
